name: Rampage World Tour
overview: Rampage World Tour is a video game released in 1997 and is the second game in the Rampage series. The game was developed as an arcade game for Midway by Game Refuge Inc. designers Brian Colin and Jeff Nauman, who conceived and designed the original back in 1986. It was then ported to the Sega Saturn, Nintendo 64, Game Boy Color, PlayStation, Microsoft Windows and as a download on the PlayStation 3's PlayStation Network only through Midway Arcade Treasures and has been re-released on Midway Arcade Treasures 2 as well as being an unlockable in Rampage: Total Destruction. The Game Boy Color port made an appearance in the movie The Beach.
